data.title: Islamic Institute of Toronto
data.meta_description: The IIT’s is a non-profit organization in Toronto, Canada who's mission is to nurture and establish Islam as a living reality in the lives of Muslims and to enhance the Islamic identity in society at large. The IIT’s mission calls for a commitment based on a sincere desire to see positive change in the world around us. The IIT will work with various organizations and groups, Muslim or not, to promote tolerance, mutual understanding, social justice, civic responsibility and god-consciousness through the platform of education.
data.text:
Home

A Place to Pray

IIT - A Place To Pray

The IIT is committed to the Prophetic legacy of promoting Islamic education that is authentic and relevant to the times in which we live.

A Place to Ponder

IIT - A Place To Ponder

Our education programs are complemented by a wide variety of other social and recreational programs, giving our students and wider community the opportunity to interact and develop together.

A Place to Ponder

IIT - A Place To Play

Our indoor gym provide adults and youth the opportunity to participate in sports such as ball hockey, basketball, volleyball, and more! The IIT also has a Scouts program and annual Summer Camp!

Latest Announcements

Live on YouTube

Prayer Times

قَالَ شُعَيْبٌ وَحَدَّثَنِي نَافِعٌ، عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ عُمَرَ، قَالَ تَفْضُلُهَا بِسَبْعٍ وَعِشْرِينَ دَرَجَةً‏.‏

Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar: The reward of the congregational prayer is twenty seven times greater (than that of the prayer offered by a person alone).

Sahih al-Bukhari 649

Jumuah Schedule

Jumuah is offered in-person and live online every Friday at 1:30 pm

DateKhateeb July 26Sh. Musleh Khan August 2Mansour Shouman August 9Sh. Ahmad Kutty August 16Sh. Abdullah Hakim Quick August 23Sh. Musleh Khan August 30Sh. Mamoun Hasaan

Upcoming Events

[ecs-list-events thumb='true' thumbwidth='300' thumbheight='250' venue='true' excerpt='300' limit='5' viewall='true' contentorder='thumbnail, title, date, venue, excerpt']

Services

Pray

The foundation of the Muslim’s life is Salaah (Prayer). We offer a space for the five time daily Salaah, Salaatul Jumuah (The Friday Prayer), Salaatul Taraweeh, Qiyam-ul-Layl, and more!

Ponder

One of the IIT’s objectives is the transmission of authentic knowledge. Check out the variety of new and continuing courses (or an on-demand course) that we offer.

Play

Both youth and adults have the opportunity to participate in various recreational activities at the IIT such as the IIT Ball Hockey league, the Islamic Soccer League, or even Friday Night Recreation!
